messages.title: My pledges for Lichfield, Burntwood and the villages.
content: A £10 MINIMUM WAGE FOR EVERY ONE, NOW: Lichfield foodbank is giving out more food this year than ever before. No government should allow this.
PROPER FUNDING FOR LOCAL COUNCILS: School crossing patrols and Friary Grange put under threat because of Tory cuts to councils.
REVERSE CUTS TO POLICE NUMBERS: 556 Police officers cut in Staffordshire and rural crime at a 7-year high. Only Labour will reverse this.
ACTION ON AFFORDABLE HOUSING: Over 2,000 people waiting for housing in Lichfield and declining home ownership by young people.
BREAK THE BREXIT DEADLOCK: Take the decision on Brexit away from politicians and give the power back to the people.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Lichfield foodbank is giving out more food this year than ever before. No government should allow this.
School crossing patrols and Friary Grange put under threat because of Tory cuts to councils.
556 Police officers cut in Staffordshire and rural crime at a 7-year high. Only Labour will reverse this.
Over 2,000 people waiting for housing in Lichfield and declining home ownership by young people.
Take the decision on Brexit away from politicians and give the power back to the people.

community.content: Over 2,000 people waiting for housing in Lichfield and declining home ownership by young people.

leaflet.personalStatement: As someone who grew up here, in Lichfield, I can see the impact of Tory austerity on our community. Westminster has ignored local people for too long. We need a strong local voice to speak up for real change, so our country works for everyone.
